name: Deballer
description:
Your screen is filling up and you need to stop it! How good is your coordination? 😏❗⏱️

Controls 

W,A,S,D and Arrow Keys to destroy the balls

 Credits

Code by: Gerard Belenguer

Terrible programmer art by: Gerard Belenguer

Music by: Aeduh (https://www.youtube.com/user/AEduhC)

Follow we on twitter for more thingies made by me: @GerardBelenguer (https://twitter.com/GerardBelenguer)

The game was rushed and made on the go but I really hope you enjoy it! Feedback is much appreciated!
